description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing single storey rear extension), creation of front Juliet balcony at second floor level, through the installation of balustrade to the front bay window and replacement of central window panel with a glazed door at second floor level and replacement timber framed double glazed windows (rear elevation, first and loft floors)(like for like)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Proposed Plans Rev B dated Jan 2023 - Proposed Basement Floor Plans drawing no.P00, Proposed Ground Floor Plans drawing no.P01, Proposed First Floor Plans drawing no.P02, Proposed Second Floor Plans drawing no. P03, Proposed Roof Floor Plans drawing no.P04, Proposed Rear Elevation drawing no.P05,  Proposed Side Elevation drawing no.P07, Proposed Section A-A drawing no.P08, Proposed Section B-B drawing no.P09, Proposed Garden Plan drawing no.P10 and Proposed Front Yard drawing no.P11 and Front Elevation drawing no. P06C rec. 13/1/2023 and email confirmation (balustrade - hardwood and detailing information)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | Details of the proposed balustrade and associated door the front elevation hereby approved shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before their installation and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. The details shall include 1:20 cross sectional drawings, transoms, glazing, fixings and ironmongery and finials.

Reason: To ensure that the development harmonises with the character and appearance of the dwelling and would preserve the special character and appearance of the Bedford Park Conservation Area, in accordance with the Bedford Park Conservation Area Management Plan, policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18) policy DAA, policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - sections 12 and 16.
